1.content:
It was late Friday night, two friends, Laura and Jade were just removing some junk that had found it's way on top of Laura's mothers garage over years.

Both girls were only 16 years old and stood around 5ft 5 inches tall,
Laura had a perfect body, she was slim yet easily had E cups, Jade on the other hand was slightly on the chunkier side, and wore glasses, typical nerdy appearance.

Suddenly a child's pool filled with water fell onto the two, curiously it instantly dried, all of a sudden the girl felt something was wrong, their bodies began to change.
They grew...

11.content:
Laura and Jade stood there soaked by some kind of kiddie pool, but to their shock, the water almost instantaneously evaporated! They stared at each other and they both appeared to be dry as a bone, though there clothes still had that wet look, but didn't fill wet to the touch.

"He-hey, what just happened? I thought we got soaked, but I can't feel anything..." Laura explained.

Jade shrugged her shoulders and decided to just ignore it. I mean there wasn't anyway to explain it, but at least they weren't wet. The two left the yard they were in and headed to Jade's house. Laura sat on the living room couch and awaited for Jade to come back with the bag of popcorn. The two were going to watch a cheesy movie on the TV. Jade soon came back into the living room with a fresh and hot bag of popcorn. Jade sat next to Laura, while Laura ready the video. As they munch down on the popcorn, the two hadn't noticed, but they were slowly increasing in height!

"Hey, so what is this movie anyways?" Laura asked.

"Uummm, it's about some girl who grows like really tall and goes on a rampage to get her boyfriend or something back from some slut or whatever... it's really funny and corny, though the special effects aren't too shabby to be honest." Jade replied.

The two continued to eat their popcorn and as the scene where the girl grows in the movie starts to grow incredible fast. The two were starting to speed up themselves. Laura's butt grew wider across the couch cushions, while Jade's hips seemed to be growing a bit wider and faster than her butt was. The two slowly inched upwards in size, totally oblivious to what was happening to them both. Laura who was 5'5 was inching up to 5'8 and showing no sign of stopping, while Jade was starting to hit 6 foot even. As they both grew in height, the rest of their bodies started to catch up. Laura's butt continue to increase in size and the stitching in her jean's backside were starting to break, while Jade's modest C-cups were starting to press into a mid-size Ds. Her top slowly stretched across her front chest and slowly her erect nipples were starting to become visible. Even though she was wearing a bra. Jade corrected her bra and tried to stay glued into the movie they were watching. The continued to grow as did the girl in the movie.

What will happen next... ?

The two giant girls walked off towards the nearest club.

Since it was late there was no queue for the club, the bouncer was busy with something so Laura and Jade just stood over him.

The bouncer turned around and came face to face with her shin, he followed the legs up until he got to her skirt where he could see her panties

"Here's my ID"

"But it might be a tight squeeze" he said as he opened the doors

They were bigger than usual doors however the two girls would still have trouble getting inside them

Laura laid on the floor and crawled inside, it was difficult but she got most of her body in
Trouble arose when it came to her rather large behind

"I'm gonna need some help with this" Laura shouted back

"Hey" Jade said poking the bouncer with her toe "that's you big boy" she said pushing him

The bouncer looked at Laura's huge butt, then then looked back at Jade
"A...are you sure?"

"Just do it, she won't mind" said Jade.

He tried to push but nothing happend

"Is that the bouncer?" Laura said

"Yeah, he looks so tiny next to your big butt" Jade giggled

"He can't move me on his own, help the little guy out" Laura said

Jade got down on her knees and placed each hand on one of Laura's cheeks, the bouncer just watched and after not too long Laura was inside

"Now it's my turn!" Jade eagerly got down to crawl in just like Laura but suddenly she began to grow
"What the hell?"

Her legs were now in the road, and whilst trying to get free she accidentally crushed a car.
It was safe to say she was now too big to fit through the door the same way Laura had as she now towered over her.

The bouncer, now terrified ran inside,
"I'm sorry miss, you're just to big now!" said the bouncer

"Dammit.." Jade said standing to her feet
"Tell the other girl im going to find somewhere else and that I'll meet her later"

Jade then walked off into the night.

"Jade?" Laura called back

"Your friend began to grow and decided to go somewhere else"
The bouncer told her

"She grew again? Well how big?" Said Laura

"Much larger than yourself" he said "just what are you? Why are you so tall?"

Laura ignored him and walked in the club.
There was nothing she could do about Jade, if she's grown then that was that, and hey, she'd just got into her first club without any ID!
It was time for the fun to begin!

choices: "Sure! Where do you wanna go next?"

1221221.content:
When the titanic Jade finally pulled Isabel's body from the cavernous folds of her breasts, there was little doubt that the woman was dead. The flesh of Jade's tits, soft as they were, was simply too overwhelming to a normal-sized woman.

"Huh, too bad," Jade noted casually, dropping the body carelessly onto the club floor. Isabelle's remains hit the ground with a thud, scattering any club-goers who had elected to remain behind. Lauren was aghast at the accident, but even more put off by her larger friend's attitude.

"Jade! What's wrong with you? You crushed her!"

Jade blinked down at her friend, as if she was speaking a different language. "...so?"

"So? You killed a woman! That's... since when are you that mean?"

"Mean? I'm the mean one? People like your club friends have been teasing and bullying me my whole life, just because I'm a little heavy. They're the mean ones. And now that I'm the one who's special, I'm not going to worry myself if one of them accidentally gets hurt."

Lauren frowned at this. She knew her friend had to put up with a lot of bullying and such at school, and while Lauren would step in to protect her when the situation called for it, she never really gave it that much thought. She had no idea how much anger had been festering in her friend.

"We might as well move on, Lauren," Jade said. "Looks like the party is over, here. Let's see who else wants to play."

Lauren hesitated. It didn't sound like Jade planned to go out of her way to hurt anyone, and if Lauren went with her, she might be able to keep her larger friend under control. On the other hand, maybe it would be better to just tell Jade off right now, and let her know how terrible her new attitude was.

Having reached a decision, Lauren replied,
1221221.title: Potential for Conflict

12212212.content:
"I'm not going anywhere with you until you promise not to hurt anyone else!" Lauren snapped defiantly, glaring up at her larger friend.

Jade frowned. "Really? Even now, you're gonna' try to boss me around again? News flash, girl: you don't call the shots anymore."

"I don't think it's too much to ask that you not, you know, CRUSH people!"

Jade was getting angry, now. From her perspective, Lauren had always had it all: she'd been prettier, more self-confident, and much, much more popular. Now Jade was the one in the spotlight, and Lauren was trying to steal that from her? Oh, that would most certainly not happen.

"I have one little accident, and you start freaking out," she sneered. "Maybe you need to see what it looks like when I actually WANT to break stuff."

"Don't you dare!"

Jade chuckled slightly, but then stopped. Something was wrong. It took her a moment to realize...
12212212.title: Moment of Truth

124.content:
"Hey..." Jade shot her friend an intrigued stare, "Wanna go visit Alice?"

"At this size?!" Laura had to hold back on a screech, "She'll freak out!"

"And doesn't that sound fun?" Jade smirked, already teasing her friend in the direction of Alice's house. The brunette stared at Jade for a moment, before realisation sunk in, and a smile touched on her face. Followed by a vigorous nod.

"Alright, let's get goin' then!" Jade chuckled, dashing off towards Alice's house. Alice may have lived a good two blocks away, but seeing as they were three times larger than even a tall person, their trip took little time at all.

Laura stifled a laugh as Jade focused all of her energy into knocking 'softly' on Alice's front door. "Alright, hide!" she hissed to Laura, and the pair of them 'hid' either side of the door. Their heads were clearly visible from the second floor of the house, but they hadn't really put enough thought into their 'plan' to have considered that. At the moment, all they wanted to do was scare the shit out of their friend.

Speaking of which... some time had passed. Both girls were growing impatient. But after what felt like an age:
124.title: Visit their other friend Alice

13.content:
By the end of their growth, the girls stood at a massive fifty feet of height. They dwarfed Jade's house, the peak of which tipped off just above their kneecaps. The garage they were in was demolished by their growths, reduced to a messy pile of rubble at their gargantuan feet. Their clothes had managed to grow with them as well, leaving them modest.

"What the frick," Lauren whined, "what the heck happened to us?"

"We're big. Like, really, really big!" her chubby friend replied. "We destroyed the garage. Mom's gonna kill me!"

Panicking, Jade began to pace back and forth, oblivious to the family sedan that lay near her feat. One step later and she tripped on it, sending her massive body down. Her belly collided with the vehicle, flattening it in one fell swoop. A small earthquake rocked the yard, though no one was nearby to see.

Rising to her feet, Jade was dismayed to find the hunk of metal plastered to her belly. Lauren, however, couldn't help but laugh.

"Shut up, this ain't funny! Now the car's ruined too..."

"Sorry, but seeing it stuck to your stomach was too funny. Come on, let's have some fun!" she said, dragging her friend by the hand. "Let's..."
13.title: Fifty Foot

133.content:
Laura dragged her still sullen friend across town, passing through the sparsely populated woods. There crowns poked out of the tree line as they navigated the dense forest. It wasn't the easiest trek, but crossing through meant that they could avoid being spotted, for the time being. The last thing they wanted was for people to be freaking out over the giant girls.

After a while, the two made it through, arriving on the far end of town. The area was mostly unpopulated, save for a few farming cottages and a single, two lane road that led to country side. This is what Laura had been looking for. More specifically, it was a certain stretch of the road that she desired: the Hillsborough pass. The pass was a mile long tunnel that cut through a series of large hills.

"Here we are, Jade. Ready to have some fun?" Laura asked.

"Fun, here? It's just the tunnel."

"Aren't you supposed to be the smart one here? C'mon, use your imagination," she said as she bent forward, her mouth nearly connecting with the tunnel's concrete arch. Her lips were big enough to engulf the entire opening.

"Think about it. You could cover the opening with your entire mouth, tricking someone into driving into your mouth. Or you could cover it with your butt, having them crash into your behind."

"How is that fun?" Laura asked.

"It's a prank, duh! It'll be fun, trust me. But I guess if you're really against it I could always put my chest against it and let them just travel through my 'canyon'," Laura said, snickering.

Jade still didn't understand how this would be fun, but she didn't question if further. Laura had always been the brains behind the stupid stuff they did, so if she really thought it would be fun, it was worth a shot.

The two discussed it further, before deciding on...

"
133.title: The Tunnel

choices: Jade rather enjoyed that...let's find something else to eat

1331.content:
Jade was still rather unsure about this whole idea, but Lauren was persistent enough to wear the less-assertive grantees down. Getting onto her hands and knees, Jade's prodigious rear was hefted into the air, while her chubby tummy was rubbing against the concrete trail below. She felt rather embarrassed; she'd always been a bit self-conscious about her extra curves, and being this huge only made her more aware of the extra padding she carried around.

"Go ahead," Lauren urged, giggling. "You gotta make a little groove in the road so you can get your mouth around the whole thing."

"This is stupid," Jade muttered, but she did comply, wearing the trail away until her chin was securely below the level of the road. She opened her mouth wide, completely engulfing the entrance to the tunnel.

Continuing to laugh at the sight, Lauren lightly spanked her friend's rump. "Got anything yet?"

Jade was entirely certain that this whole tunnel game was just Lauren's way to embarrass her even further. She was about to pull her mouth away from the tunnel to reply with some angry retort, when she felt a slightly vibration through her lips. Someone was coming through the tunnel, and Jade wasn't sure what to do.

Her moment of indecision was all the time the unseen vehicle needed to exit the tunnel, only to enter a brand new cavern. Jade pulled up suddenly, shuddering and coughing slightly as the car desperately tried to change direction, the driver having no idea what was going on. The only sound aside from Jade's surprised coughs was Lauren's uproarious laughter.

"Oh, this is just priceless!" she giggled. "Go ahead, girl... spit 'em out."

Jade glared at her friend, angry at the fun being had at her expense. She tried to pin the vehicle with her tongue, so she could shout her protests, only to send the car sliding down the black expanse of her throat.

There was a moment of silence.

Then, Lauren let out a surprised, "Oh, fuck."

1543.content:
"Jade, wait, look at yourself!" Laura said.

"I know, I'm half a foot tall," Jade wailed. "We both are!"

"No, I mean look at yourself," Laura said, grabbing Jade by the arm and dragging her to an ornate mirror sitting on the garage floor. Jade was struggling all the way until she saw her own image in the mirror. Jade froze at what she saw.

Jade hadn't only shrunk. She'd changed.

Laura looked the same as always. She had the type of face and body that all the guys (and some of the girls) drooled over at school. Long dark hair that reached down to the small of her back, perfect face, light blue eyes, fair unblemished skin, trim athletic body, those large breasts that seemed to defy gravity...

Laura had it all.

Jade was just the opposite. She was the geeky Asian girl that everyone wanted help with when it came to schoolwork, but no one would ever think about her romantically. Her thick glasses were always held together by masking tape at the bridge. She always had some piece of food stuck in her crooked teeth, she always had a new blemish on her face, and her too small clothes showed Jade had something of a belly.

But not anymore.

The Jade in the mirror looked like one of those sexed up anime versions of a Chinese princess. Jade's eyeglasses had disappeared when she shrank, and she found she didn't need them. Jade's brown eyes always seemed off kilter, but now they were soulful beacons in her beautiful, symmetrical, unblemished face. Her teeth were white and perfect, her hair long, straight, shining, brushed out and, like Laura's, reaching down to the small of her back. Her stomach was flat, and her ass and legs now trim and fit.

Jade used to be three inches taller than Laura, but now she seemed to be the same height (even if it was a shrunken height).

But the biggest change to Jade (besides being six inches tall) was the increased size of her breasts. Jade's breasts looked to be the same size as Laura's, and just as gravity defying.

And the final strange thing was that Jade's clothes seemed to have adjusted for her new, better, fitter shape.

Jade turned around, checking out her improved body
